titleInfo.title: Discharge of David Beard from volunteer military service in the Natchez country under Andrew Jackson

subject.geographic: United States -- History -- War of 1812 -- Military personnel.

mods.note: This document is the discharge of David Beard from volunteer military service in the Natchez country under Andrew Jackson. Beard served from December 10, 1812 until April 22, 1812. The document is signed by Major General Andrew Jackson.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
